## kl list accounts

list all the accounts accessible to you

### Synopsis

```
List Accounts

This command will help you to see list of all the accounts that's accessible to you. 

Examples:
  # list accounts accessible to you
  kl list accounts

```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for accounts
```
